sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import logolight from './imgs/logo/logolight.png' import logodark from './imgs/logo/logodark.png' import Toggle from './ThemeToggle' import { ThemeContext } from "./ThemeContext" import location_context from "./locationcontext" import {tooglemain_menu, toogleside_menu} from "./tooglemenus" const Header = () => { const { theme, set_theme } = useContext(ThemeContext); const whereami_arr = useContext(location_context); return (
{(whereami_arr[0] === "Home" || whereami_arr[0] === "Subreddit_page") && }
{whereami_arr[0] === "Reddit" ? : } {whereami_arr[0] === "Favorite" ? : }
{whereami_arr[0] === "Reddit" ? : } {whereami_arr[0] === "Favorite" ? : }
) }; export default Header
